Text: Powerful words from @realDonaldTrump tonight making it clear all Americans are going to be protected.This is what we elected President Trump to do - to lead with bold, dramatic action. These lawless riots ; acts of violence will not continue indefinitely. They will end now.

What congress? What senate? What constitution? This is a Trump coup d'etat. He's declared martial law, the U.S. is officially a dictatorship. EVERYONE TAKE THE STREETS NOW.#ICantBreathe #GeorgeFloyd #BlackLivesMatter #REVOLUTION  https://t.co/jI19duKADP
Equivocation fallacy. Don't they teach you how to avoid that at Harvard, or is it all uninformed activism classes now?

.@cnn @newday, Trump did the photo w/ the with the Bible because he is desperately appealing to his Christian nationalist base. That's how it helps him. Y'all shouldn't be perplexed. Please report on Christian nationalism. You're missing it. He needs their vote. That's why.

You may think it's only a small thing that the military used helicopters to intimidate American civilians in the nation's capital. It's not. A line was crossed tonight. There will be other lines. This is Trump conditioning them to cross those lines.

We called Trump a coward for hiding in a bunker so to prove how tough he is, he had the police tear gas a bunch of peaceful protestors just to walk across the street to hold a Bible in front of St. John's church for a photo op. He's not just a coward he's an evil pussy ass bitch.

The active-duty military is trained to destroy things and kill people. @realDonaldTrump never served and may not understand that mission. Invoking the Insurrection Act so our military can aim their guns at Americans would be insane, and increase the likelihood of dead Americans.
Dear fundamentalist Christian Trump supporters: If Obama had held the Bible backwards and upside down, you would immediately have called him the Antichrist.
Not just a photo-op. This will be a campaign commercial. Trump exploited police and the US military—after peaceful protesters were gassed—to gather footage that will likely be used in political ads.

Please don't just post a black square. Write to your MP now with these demands: - Immediate suspension of UK sales of teargas, riot shields + rubber bullets to the US - Condemn Trump's use of force against his own citizens- Release the delayed report into BAME Covid deaths
